item.title: New Website
item.description: Welcome to the new website of the Etherington Group. Please feel free to explore and have a look around! Marc Etherington Assistant Professor Department of Mathematics, Physics and Electrical Engineering Northumbria University

item.title: Publications
item.description: 2023 Extended Conjugation Attenuates the Quenching of Aggregation-Induced Emitters by Photocyclization Pathways img=“sun.jpg” text=“The Sun is the star at the center of the Solar System. It is a nearly perfect sphere of hot plasma, with internal convective motion that generates a magnetic field via a dynamo process. It is by far the most important source of energy for life on Earth. Credits.”
